data.message: Hi Facebook, I have a problem with a page I was apart of not working anymore. Can you help with that?

replies.message: Hi Loni. Please use the following Help Center form to report an issue with your business Page: http://on.fb.me/1QW2lDt. Thanks. -Azaria

I have already tried that and received no response whatsoever. Other people who belonged and created the page have tried also yet no one has received a message from anyone. It is extremely frustrating and heartbreaking

Loni Leppioja is it how the feed is setup now?  Like in the groups it will choose to show you a nothing post from 2 weeks ago and you have to scroll to find the ones that you looked at 2 seconds before.
